author: bblfish
msg: 2 more fixes for CLEREZZA-533 dealing with hashes in URIs. Also reworked access control limitations.

author: bblfish
msg: CLEREZZA-515: fix for previous commit. threw a null pointer exception

author: bblfish
msg: CLEREZZA-516: Improved profile panel so that logged in users with accounts can immediately add a friend (and also made sure anonymous does not fall into that category)

author: bblfish
msg: as a workaround to the patch #1104571 submitted for  CLEREZZA-533 "TcProvider does not (should not?) dereference URIs with hash" which means that URIs with hashes throw exceptions. Waiting until a consensus establishes itself on what should be done there. But this is needed in the meantime.

author: bblfish
msg: CLEREZZA-515: ugly account name when logging in. This allows remote foaf name to be displayed, making use of information from the WebID take from remote users. It also does not force the creation of a local account name.
